title: I CANNOT TRANSFER OBB FILES FROM DOWNLOADS TO MY ANDROID FOLDER IN MY PIXEL PHONE -PROTOCOL? HELP!:(
content: I HAVE AN ERROR WHENEVER I TRY TO EXTRACT AN OBB FILE FROM DOWNLOADS, INTO THE ANDROID OBB FOLDER! IS IT A PERMISSION ISSUE? IS THE FILE PATH TOO LONG? I'VE ALLOWED MY APPS TO HAVE PERMISSION BUT NOTHING IS WORKING. I CANNOT PLAY GAMES WITH OBB FILES SIMPLY BECAUSE IT'S NOT EXTRACTABLE OR TRANSFERABLE TO THE ANDROID FOLDER.
